en.title: [Jan 2025] Labour Force
en.description: Monthly labour force report, covering statistics on unemployment, employment, and labour force participation.
en.description_email: DOSM has just released the latest monthly Labour Force Survey report, covering statistics on unemployment, employment, and labour force participation. The unemployment rate remained constant at 3.2% (no change since Aug 2024), while the labour force participation rate increased to 70.6%% (Nov 2024: 70.5%).

bm.title: [Jan 2025] Tenaga Buruh
bm.description: Laporan tenaga buruh bulanan, merangkumi statistik pengangguran, penduduk bekerja, dan penyertaan tenaga buruh.
bm.description_email: DOSM telah menerbitkan laporan Survei Tenaga Buruh bulanan terkini, merangkumi statistik pengangguran, penduduk bekerja, dan penyertaan tenaga buruh. Kadar pengangguran kekal pada 3.2% (tiada perubahan sejak Ogo 2024), manakala kadar penyertaan tenaga buruh meningkat kepada 70.6% (Nov 2024: 70.5%).
